column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zuko says : " Uncle ... you were unconscious .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I hope I made it the way you like it .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Good .
#Text=That was very ... uhhh ... bracing .
#Text=" Zuko says : " So Uncle , I 've been thinking .
#Text=It 's only a matter of time before I run into Azula again .
#Text=I 'm going to need to know more advanced firebending if I want to stand a chance against her .
#Text=I know what you 're going to say : she 's my sister and I should be trying to get along with her .
#Text=" Iroh says : " No , she 's crazy , and she needs to go down .
#Text=It 's time to resume your training .
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't understand what went wrong .
#Text=He did it exactly the way you did .
#Text=" Aang says : " Maybe there 's another way ... what if I came at the boulder from another angle ?
#Text=" Toph says : " No .
#Text=That 's the problem .
#Text=You 've got to stop thinking like an airbender .
#Text=There 's no different angle , no clever solution , no trickety - trick that 's going to move that rock .
#Text=You 've got to face it head on .
#Text=And when I say head on , I mean like this ... " Aang says : " Whoa !
#Text=" Katara says : " I 've been training Aang for a while now .
#Text=He really responds well to a positive teaching experience .
#Text=Lots of encouragement and praise .
#Text=Kind words .
#Text=If he 's doing something wrong , maybe a gentle nudge in the right direction .
#Text=" Toph says : " Thanks , Katara .
#Text=A gentle nudge .
#Text=I 'll try that .
#Text=Keep your knees high , Twinkle Toes !
#Text="
